We love running engaging, audience-driven workshops that include live data work and a focus on the experience - not recycling the same dry content. These are not sales funnel webinars. 

Come learn, have fun and leave equipped with new knowledge and skills.

# Useful info and T&Cs

- We run in-person and online workshops.
    
    - Online workshops are hosted via Zoom.

    - In-person workshops will also provide accessibility information.

- Unless otherwise stated in your ticket, we have a [default refunds policy](data-ethics_t-and-cs.html#ticket-refund-policy).
